body: i bought gold and I've waited for 30 mins and still not here!! plz help! want money back or the rank!

title: Gold!!! MY GOLD!!!

replies.body: It could take longer, be patient. If it doesn't come within 2 days, contact a Staff Member.
replies.body_tagged: It could take longer, be patient. If it doesn't come within 2 days, contact a Staff Member.

replies.body: Ranks can take up to 12 hours to work. Email support@avicus.net with proof of purchase if it takes longer.
replies.body_tagged: Ranks can take up to 12 hours to work. Email support@avicus.net with proof of purchase if it takes longer.

replies.body: If it takes more than 48 hours please email support@avicus.net with proof of the purchase.
replies.body_tagged: If it takes more than 48 hours please email support@avicus.net with proof of the purchase.
